comments.body: A `license_file` entry is required for GPL

Sorry! I followed examples of other r-packages on conda-forge, which were GPL, but did not have a license_file entry. I'll try to amend this.  How's this:
- I went to the CRAN bookdown page, https://cran.rstudio.com/web/packages/bookdown/index.html
- I followed the GPL-3 link given for License on that page
- I copied the License text in that link into a file LICENSE.txt that I placed in the recipe directory
- I cite this file in the meta.yaml under 'about:' as follows:
license_file: '{{ environ["RECIPE_DIR"] }}/LICENSE.txt'
Will this suffice?
Thanks,
Bengt

Yes, that will suffice. Thanks.

> I followed examples of other r-packages on conda-forge, which were GPL, but did not have a license_file entry

I think we should have license_file in all of those recipes. cc @conda-forge/core
